ch.hsr.se2p.mrt.models
Class GpsPosition

java.lang.Object
  ch.hsr.se2p.mrt.models.GpsPosition

public class GpsPosition
extends Object

A GpsPosition contains the geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude). Additionally, time is the time when the gpsPosition was fixed and the createdAt is the time when the gpsPosition was saved the first time.
